title: Customer Service Practical Competency Enhancement: Statistical Feature Extraction and Dimensionality Reduction for MRI Brain Tumor Classification

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary statistics, linear algebra, and Python programming experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can extract five or more statistical features (texture, intensity distribution, etc.) from MRI images
Learners can reduce high-dimensional feature data by 80% or more using principal component analysis (PCA) or LDA
Learners can achieve 85% or higher accuracy in brain tumor classification by applying Bayes classifiers and kNN algorithms
Learners can compare Euclidean/Manhattan distance metrics to select optimal classification models
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
